price: এতেকে যেতিয়া শিঙাত ফুঁ দিয়া হ’ব—কেৱল এটা ফুঁ।
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri nafkhatun wāḥidatun
